story:
It's time for an album of original music!

The Michelle Taylor Band has been rocking venues all over Western Washington for almost seven years! From clubs, to casinos, to festivals, and even at CenturyLink Field playing for the Seahawks' fans, the band has performed for crowds of all musical tastes. We've been packing dance floors with covers of popular songs across multiples genres, including blues, rock, country, and pop music, but now it's time for an album of our original songs!

We have enjoyed delivering musical excellence and a fun, entertaining show for our fans and friends, with a setlist of cover tunes that you all know and love. Over the years, we have also included many original songs that you have also embraced and enjoyed. Now, we want to release an album of those original songs, both for your listening pleasure and to establish ourselves as a band of talented musicians that are passionate about our craft, eager to share our creativity with a broader audience.

We need your help to create an excellent album!

We are asking all of you to help us in achieving this goal. The saying, "you get what you pay for," is true, and in this instance it isn't a cheap endeavor. To create an excellent album requires not only an investment of our time and talents, it requires a significant monetary investment.

We have calculated a cost of about $12,000 to produce an album of the quality that we would like to deliver for you. All of the money raised through this campaign will go directly toward the creation of this album.

No contribution is too small! While we do have a significant monetary goal, it can be achieved with the help of many. Every contribution makes an impact! All of your contributions will be rewarded not only with our undying gratitude, but also with perks for you! On this page, you can see some of those perks as determined by the size of the contribution.

To provide an excellent album, we need a quality studio.

Our last album was lots of fun for us and well-received by our fans. It was a live studio recording, but in the setting of an intimate party with many of our fans, friends, and family. That album was primarily cover songs with one of our originals. This album is of a different, much larger scope in that it will be all original songs, created with the passion of each member of this band.

In order to produce what we feel will be the best quality album, we will be recording at London Bridge Studio in Seattle. For 30 years bands have made the trek to London Bridge Studio creating memorable music for fans of all types.  They have recorded amazing artists like, Pearl Jam, Alice In Chains, Mother Love Bone, Soundgarden, Temple Of The Dog, Blind Melon, Fleet Foxes, Macklemore and Ryan Lewis, and so many more.  London Bridge has the experience and reputation for excellence that we need.

Those of you that know us, have seen our shows, and heard our music, know that we have the talent and the drive to make this album a success. We have had a wonderful journey as a band with you, our fans and friends.  We want to continue this journey with you and achieve yet another level of excellence with this album.

Other Ways You Can Help.

Some people just aren't able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!  Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!  Indiegogo has tools for sharing, and most of you are able to share this across different social media outlets.  And don't forget word-of-mouth sharing!  We have a wonderful group of friends, and if y'all share this with your friends, and they share with their friends, and so on, and so on... you get the picture!  We can achieve this goal together!

From all of us to all of you, thank you!

We have had a wonderful journey as a band with you, our fans and friends.  We want to continue this journey with you and achieve yet another level of excellence with this album.

Some people just aren't able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!  Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!  Indiegogo has tools for sharing, and most of you are able to share this across different social media outlets.  And don't forget word-of-mouth sharing!  We have a wonderful group of friends, and if y'all share this with your friends, and they share with their friends, and so on, and so on... you get the picture!  We can achieve this goal together!
From all of us to all of you, thank you!

story:
present Moment. 

After 11 days in the studio creating, recording and grounding my new EP Seed, we've got all the ingredients in the mix. Now we are ready to take the next steps of editing, mixing and mastering these inspired songs. We are so close we can taste it. The music is simmering and awaiting the final touches to be able to be shared with the world. 

a little while ago... The power of a question! 

Two years ago, my wife Melanie sat me down, looked me in the eye and asked, "what is your dream?"

At first, I didn't know what to say. I had buried my dreams under layers of excuses, insecurities, and distractions. Feelings of not being good enough kept me from trusting myself and following my heart. 

Melanie was persistent, curious and lovingly present. 

This music is the answer to her question.  

If what I've shared resonates with you, please join me on this journey.

My name is Jeremy Roske. I'm a singer/songwriter, musician & actor. My musical journey started at the age of 13, as a founding member of Earth Guardians.  We used message-driven music to educate, uplift and inspire action on behalf of our planet and all life. The highlight of this time was the Children's Torch of Hope Tour in 1995, where we performed and spoke at over 40 events in 29 states. 

In 2005 I co-organized and spearheaded the Voice of Youth Tour. Traveling to India and New Zealand, my band Rapsody performed concerts and gave workshops focused on youth empowerment through creative expression. That year I released my first album, Troubadours which I later re-released as 'People Rise".

Throughout my life I have been transformed by the healing power of music. I feel it resonate through my whole being and ripple out into the world. This is my medicine and how I connect with myself and relate with life. My songs are reflections of the ever-changing landscape of the human experience, best described as Music of Change.

 

the Music 

Out of the many songs that I've written, I've chosen  5 songs that I'm inspired to bring into fruition at this time. 

Here is a taste of what we've created thus far. This video is a compilation of highlights of the 5 tracks in their rough stage of development. With your help, these songs can be completed and shared far and wide. 

 

1. Foundation 
2. Steady She Goes

3. Warriors Heart

4. Vessel 

5. Seed 

 

the Need 

My intention is to raise $5,000 to cover the costs of editing, mixing and mastering all 5 songs.

If we surpass our goal, all the funds raised will go into a music video and promotion of the EP. 

 

the Team

For many years, I've been looking and praying for a co-creative music partner/producer that can support me and help bring my music to life. Ben is the answer to that prayer! I have searched far and wide and have waited patiently for such a soul. 

Ben Last  

Producer, Musician, Sound Healer, Workshop Facilitator and Teacher, Benjamin Last has been producing music with over 24 years. Ben is a highly experienced Recording Engineer, Audio Editor, Electronic Music Programmer, Sound and Mastering Engineer. Facilitating music production has become his fine art and created in him a deep commitment to the medium of sound and music. Ben has come to the project with a depth of experience working artists such as Desert Dwellers, Deya Dova, Perquois, Murray Kyle, Darpan, Ganga Giri just to name a few.

https://motivmusic.com/                

@motiv_music_team

Contributing artists:

Sandrayati Fay / @sandrayatifay

 

Andro Yopi / @androyopi

 

Algimiro 'Cellomano' / @cellomano

 

why Now?

The world needs us now more than ever to shine our light, share our gifts and offer our medicine. This project is affirming the truth of why I'm here and what I was born to express. 
 

the Call

There are many ways to support getting this Music of Change out into the world. Any contribution big or small is welcomed with gratitude. Spreading the word is also really appreciated! Thank you for helping to make this dream a reality!

story:
Sweet Noireen & Other Assorted Love Songs.. a new classic rock album!

 

Hi everyone! We would like to introduce ourselves to you. We are Desperados d'Amour, a classic rock / Southern rock band from the Netherlands. Being active since late 2010, we have now built up a batch of original songs. Because of the good response we get at our live shows, we have now decided to bring out our first album. The band consists of Grant E. Love (voc/gtr), Ton "The Manimal" Van Dijk (dr), Jesse Brock (b/voc) and Richard VanderLinden (gtr). the albumj will be produced and mixed by Djuri Boot, one of Hollands finest music producers.

As an unsiged band, we fund the album with the money we make of our live gigs. Unfortunately, we don't make enough money at the moment to fund the whole proces yet, although we do a good job so far. We feel that our songs have the quality to be released on an album so we can bring them to a bigger audience, and we hope you want to help us to achieve that goal. We love classic rock, blues rock and southern rock and we want to make our addition to the genre with our album.

If you help us, then you help us to make a dream come true, releasing an album and make our music more known to the rock audiences around the world. Like a lot of other colleague musicians, we have to pay our rents, buy food, you know: the usual things you do to keep yourself alive. We have worked really hard to produce great songs, and because we want to deliver a quality CD album, we have started this crowdfunding project to make it happen!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need € 5000 to:

  • Finish the recordings. So far, we have finished one complete song (which you can hear in the video on this page) and have recorded the basic tracks (drums, bass and guitars) for most other songs.We need a part of the funds to record the vocals, backing vocals and a few lead guitars. The album will have 11 tracks.
  • The final mix. Once all the parts have been recorded, a part of the funds is used to make a real killer mix of the songs. After all, we want our songs to sound the best they can!
  • The artwork. Ofcourse a CD album needs cool artwork, and we know just the person who designs the most beautiful artworks that will do our album justice!
  • The mastering. Essential for the sound of an album. We want to master our album at the world famous Wisseloord Studios in Hilversum, The Netherlands to make sure the album sounds every bit as great as it should sound. We stand for quality, and we feel that everyone who supports us with releasing our album should get the quality they deserve!

 

We have a few perks, as you can see on this page. We appreciate all the support we get! However, we have some cool perks for the people from The Netherlands who decide they want to pledge a little more than the standard pack, like a music lesson of 60 minutes by a bandmember of their choice, or even an acoustic performance of the band in their livingroom or at their party! And ofcourse your name will be included in the liner notes of the album!

Oh and.. if we don't reach our entire goal, we will still make the album with the funds we do have!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help us financially, you can still help us! Just let your friends that love classic rock (think of bands like Thin Lizzy, AC/.DC, ZZ Top, Lynyrd Skynyrd and others) know of our crowdfunding project! Let's create a buzz around this album! We believe in it, and it's awesome if you believe in it, too! We will be eternally grateful for this! Sharing the campaign is pretty easy: on this page you will find a tool to share it with you friends, on Facebook for instance!

Thank you so much for helping us!

 

With much gratitude:

Grant, Ton, Jesse and Richard

story:
The Land of the Rebellious Ones

Schucks Road is a two man Americana band from New York City consisting of Brandon Pfeltz and Michael Perrie Jr. We've recently been offered a record deal out in Nashville, and we'll be headed there to record our first full-length album "The Land of the Rebellious Ones". 

Through the help of indiegogo, we were able to fully fund and create our first studio EP "One By Land" from scratch. Produced by Chris Wallitsch and Mike Ceglio and recorded in The Bunker Studio in Williamsburg and The Cutting Room Studio on The Lower East Side, the EP received some really great reviews, and gained us some really amazing fans. We're looking to you to help us do that again.

In a few months, we'll be on the road to Nashville to record our first 12 track album produced by Grammy Nominee Dave Moody of The Moody Brothers. We're extremely passionate about these songs, and we're counting on you to help us make them a reality. Through the record label, we have a great opportunity to be heard on the radio and to really carve out a name for ourselves in the Americana world. 

Check out our EP on Spotify! https://play.spotify.com/artist/0GjwKyUga4Q0I3WuVuoIni?play=true&utm_source=open.spotify.com&utm_medium=open

Or iTunes! https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/schucks-road/id659580689

Or Soundcloud! https://soundcloud.com/schucks-road/sets/one-by-land

What We Need & What You Get

Nobody wants to know that their money went to waste, and we don't want to see any money go to waste. With the help of the label, we've crafted a very careful budget that will allow us the funding to make a really phenomenal album. Your help is monumental in this project. 

Recording/Production: We'll be recording in a beautiful studio in Nashville where artists such as Johnny Cash, June Carter Cash, Old Crow Medicine Show, Elvis Presley, Neil Young, and many more have recorded before us. The album will be produced by Dave Moody, whom was nominated for two Grammy Awards and countless CMAs for his work with The Moody Brothers. 

Duplication: Unlike our last album which while it looked beautiful was only kept in a cardboard sleeve, these CD's will be made with high quality packaging and lyrics books. They'll be sold in retailers throughout the country, as well as online and anywhere that they sell good music. 

Exposure: With your help, our EP was able to greatly increase our exposure. We were able to take some of the profit and register our domain name, create a mailing list, and maintain our electronic press kit, which is vital in booking gigs. However, this time we want to bring our music to a bigger market. Your money will go towards promotion, marketing, radio plays, and ensuring that our music is heard all across the country.

CHECK IT OUT
Here's how it breaks down logistically in the long run, exactly what your money will contribute to:

$5,500 - dollars for recording, mixing, mastering of 12 song album.

$1,000 - Manufacturing and delivery all across the country, real CD's!!!

$3,500 - to make a music video, and get it seen on national TV!

$2,500 - Radio Single Release & Promotion

$2,000 - Marketing, PR, Interactive Ads

$500 - electronic press kit makeover; new pics, new write-ups, updated website

The Impact

Your contribution, simply put, would mean the world to us. Without your help, this album stands no real chance of being made. We're broke and living off of the fumes of dreams. It would be an honor if you could help us achieve this huge goal of ours. These are hard times for all of us, but if you could even spare a dollar to help us make this a reality, we would truly be in your debt. This is what we want to do with our futures, and we are trying our hearts out. It would be a shame if money stood in the way of being able to spread joy through out music. If you are at a point in your life where you can give and you want to help two young musicians who are chasing dreams, then help us bring it within reach.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can help financially, and that is totally okay! Here are some ways that you can still help us out.

SHARE our campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media outlet you can think of. The more people that see this page, the closer we get to reaching the goal. You sharing might be the difference between that extra dollar we need to reach the target.

COME OUT to the shows and bring folks with you! Watch our YouTube videos and listen to the EP that we have up on our Soundcloud page, or on iTunes and Spotify. Who knows? Maybe you'll like what you hear and you've got a friend who can help us out. Even more important than making the money is making the fans. Without a fanbase, we have nothing. That's key to being a successful band. We make this music for you.

CHECK OUT our website at www.schucksroad.com and watch our videos and sign up for our mailing list!

Most importantly, thank you.

Thank you for supporting us and believing in us. Without you, none of this is possible.

story:
Dovercourt Jam Club

Every lunch hour at Dovercourt Public School, a group of 10-30 students can be found jamming away on keyboards, guitars, electric drums, loopers and samplers. This is no typical music lesson. There are no wrong notes. There is no one way to make music!

These children have dedicated precious recess time to advance their music abilities and harness their creativity in a socially engaging setting. Live performances, recordings and improvised jams have aided in the creation of new friendships. The culture of jamming encourages musical experimentation, trying new instruments, making mistakes and turning them into beats! Above all, the children are pumped to be at Jam Club, one more reason to get excited to be at school!

How it's Funded

This program has been funded by the families of this school on a pay-if-you-can basis. Programs range from $60-80 a month, ranging from 8-12 hours of jamming time! We've also launched an after school program at $20 for two hours (includes a healthy snack!). 

Despite the affordability of this program compared to typical music lessons, there are still a number of families at Dovercourt who experience financial challenges with accessing this program. We wish to expand this program to enable as many students as possible to participate without cost as a barrier. 100% of all donations will go towards completely subsidizing the costs of this program for any Dovercourt student.

The Goal:

Our goal of $5000 will easily cover the costs for dozens of additional students to participate in the club for the rest of year! The growth of the program will also enable the school to hire additional music educators to visit the students and share their knowledge. We also intend to utilize the funds to create an additional program geared towards students with autism. 

A contribution of $60 will cover a month of music workshops for one student! Even if you can only contribute $15, that's still enough to cover a week of jams for one student. Everything helps!! The value of a meaningful music education and extracurricular activities cannot be understated, The proven benefits of music towards other school subjects is something every child deserves!

When this campaign is over, I will pass over the funds to the school in a publicized event on social media (I'm thinking giant cheque?) so that you can be assured of the legitimacy of this campaign!

The students and families of Dovercourt are grateful for all contributions!

Video: Former Dovercourt student Alexander performing an original song at Spring Fling '18, recorded with the same gear we use at Jam Club! This inspiring performance is directly responsible for the growth and popularity of Dovercourt Jam Club!!

story:
Hello. My name is Elena Mexi. I was born in Greece in a beautiful place, called Preveza. I come from a humble family of fishermen and from my young ages I learned to love and respect everything that lives in the sea.

     I spent too many hours observing and admiring the life that evolved on the seabed. My dream is to bring to the rest of the world the amazing images I have seen with my own eyes.

     Later I started occupying as amateur photographer, so I was able to combine my two great loves. The result you can enjoy it too...

     My goal is to share with you the joy and freedom that I am experiencing at the seabed.

     I have so far created an innovative and smart photo album which consists of 40 postcards with images from seabed of the Greek seas. Each postcard is made with a special punch making it possible to be detached from the album without affecting the others. With this album you have a collection of original photographs which have been taken with free diving, with one breath!!!

     I am therefore requesting for your support to make my dream come true. I have taken my time to come up with this great idea and I hope you all give me your full support to enable me rialize my goal.

     Why fund this Project

        Basically the money contributed will be used for the photo album which will be made from environmentally friendly materials and better quality paper. Moreover an amount of that money will be used for renewal of my equipment, so as to bring to the "surface" even more photos from the gorgeous Greek seabed.

       I decided to host my campaign in Indiegogo , because I believe in fair and democratic sponsorship in innovative ideas. I responsibly acknowledge your support and I appreciate your interest in my work.

       It is important for me that you know my sincere respect for every living organism and that is why I would like to point out that the  sea elements that I will use for your gifts is just from what I found at the greek beaches that I visited.

     Take a breath and come with me to guide you to the deep blue! Thank you!

Underneath are some photos of the gifts:
story_txt:
Hello. My name is Elena Mexi. I was born in Greece in a beautiful place, called Preveza. I come from a humble family of fishermen and from my young ages I learned to love and respect everything that lives in the sea.
     I spent too many hours observing and admiring the life that evolved on the seabed. My dream is to bring to the rest of the world the amazing images I have seen with my own eyes.
     Later I started occupying as amateur photographer, so I was able to combine my two great loves. The result you can enjoy it too...
     My goal is to share with you the joy and freedom that I am experiencing at the seabed.
     I have so far created an innovative and smart photo album which consists of 40 postcards with images from seabed of the Greek seas. Each postcard is made with a special punch making it possible to be detached from the album without affecting the others. With this album you have a collection of original photographs which have been taken with free diving, with one breath!!!
     I am therefore requesting for your support to make my dream come true. I have taken my time to come up with this great idea and I hope you all give me your full support to enable me rialize my goal.
     Why fund this Project
        Basically the money contributed will be used for the photo album which will be made from environmentally friendly materials and better quality paper. Moreover an amount of that money will be used for renewal of my equipment, so as to bring to the "surface" even more photos from the gorgeous Greek seabed.
       I decided to host my campaign in Indiegogo , because I believe in fair and democratic sponsorship in innovative ideas. I responsibly acknowledge your support and I appreciate your interest in my work.
       It
 is important for me that you know my sincere respect for every living 
organism and that is why I would like to point out that the  sea elements
 that I will use for your gifts is just from what I found at the greek beaches that I visited.
     Take a breath and come with me to guide you to the deep blue! Thank you!
Underneath are some photos of the gifts:

We are a band out of Kansas City called Knock Kneed Sally

This year we are fortunate to be appearing at King Biscuit on the main stage Friday.

We have most of our expenses covered at this point but are a little short regarding rooms and grub.

So, we are reaching out to you for some help.

We will do a video from King Biscuit to thank you from the stage, which should be super fun.

Thank you in advance, you're amazing.

story:
WHO AM I?

Hi, I'm Colin Joel. I love music and inspiring others through creativity. For the past six years, I have been experimenting with electronic music as well as refining my songwriting skills. I have self-produced two EP albums over the past three years and now I am ready to hit the studio!!! (You can sample some of my previous work at www.reverbnation.com/colinjoelmusic)


Since the beginning of January, I have spent many days and nights writing, sampling, and arranging material for a new album. Now, I can proudly say that the album is ready to take flight, but I need your help.


HOW MUCH DO I NEED TO RAISE?

My initial goal is $2,000, which will cover recording costs. Ultimately, I would like to raise $5000. The additional funds will go towards:


+      Mixing & Mastering

+      CD & Web Distribution

+      Touring/Music Video Fund


ARE THERE ANY GOODIES?

By contributing to my project, you will receive perks listed on the right! >>>>>


For example, for a $10 donation, you will receive a pre-release digital copy of the album. For $25, I will send you a personalized autographed copy of the album as well as the pre-release digital copy. And so on...


Any amount and all donations are very much appreciated. 


ADOPT A SONG

Donate $250 to my album, and a personalized dedication will be printed next to the song of your choice! It's a limited opportunity to literally adopt a part of the album. You can even dedicate the song to a friend, spouse, or tree for that matter. :) And yes, you can remain anonymous if you would like. 


HOW CAN YOU CONTRIBUTE?

When you click "Contribute Now," fill out your donation info and choose to pay with PayPal at the bottom. If you have an account with them, great! If not, you do not need to make one - PayPal will process credit cards as well.  Once you are taken to the PayPal screen, you will see “Choose a Way To Pay” at the top. If you do not have an account with PayPal, click “Pay with credit or debit card” and make sure to uncheck the box that says “Save this information with a PayPal account.” Pay as a Guest with your credit card and you are all set.  


If you prefer not to pay over the internet, you may also donate by check. Contact me via email for more info!


HOW CAN YOU BECOME A FAN?

Spread the word via Facebook, Twitter, friends or random people on the street! :) By sharing, you become the voice for this project. Getting your friends involved can make a world of a difference. 


Leave me a comment (under the comments tab) if you would like to join my Street Team & help me promote the album once it's complete!


WHEN DO YOU GET YOUR GOODIES?

You'll receive all your perks before the official release date! I will keep you posted on the progress of the album and give an official date ASAP.


ADDITIONAL QUESTIONS

Send me a comment or email me at colinjoelmusic@yahoo.com

story:
Dear Supporter,

For the last ten years I have worked vigorously to build my name as an expert in event planning, as well as image and brand consulting. With that have come many great accomplishments including my book “Life with Style”, being named “Entrepreneur of Year” by Man of the Hour Magazine, and named in the “10 under 40” to watch in the Philadelphia Region by the Philadelphia Tribune.

 

Through this season I have remained true to my God given gift of music, just simply waiting for the right time to share it with the world again. I am pleased to announce that the time has come! As of August 2012 I have returned to sharing my gift of writing, singing, playing and performing with the world.

 

Over the next few months I will be working to record my first solo music project. I am no stranger to working in the studio, as I have lent my voice to many projects in the area of background vocals. However this time is special because it is my first solo project.

 

As you can imagine, this project takes a lot of work and finances to be effective and successful. It is my prayer that you will support my passion by sewing a financial seed which will help fund the needed studio time to record a professional project. Upon its’ release, my album will be available to the public and shopped to various labels, as an independent artist. 

Thank you for believing in me and making yet another dream a reality!

 

With Sincerity,

Cameron Washington

story:
Kent Goolsby & the Folks are set to record Kent's debut album, "Trophies Of Youth", with Glossary's Joey Kneiser at the helm and need your help!

Kent Goolsby is the former frontman of Murfreesboro, TN's now defunct Only Sons, who shared the stage with Jason Isbell, Those Darlins, Glossary, American Aquarium & Two Cow Garage along with many, many other great artists. Since his time with The Only Sons, Kent has continued to tour & fine-tune new material for his debut album and after 9 months of breaking them in on the road, 10 songs have made the cut. 

"Trophies Of Youth" is a full band effort, with Nashville, TN's The Folks serving as the backing band, which is made up of Steve Daly (guitar, steel, vocals), Dan Eubanks (upright bass/electric bass) & Shakey Fowlkes (drums). Glossary's Joey Kneiser will handle the mixing, recording & mastering. The album is the most cohesive collection of songs Kent has ever arranged with a sound that leans more towards roots music/americana than the later part of The Only Sons output. It draws influence from New Morning-era Bob Dylan as well as The Band and John Prine. 

Full disclosure: We are a 100% DIY band and your help is genuinely appreciated and needed. The funds raised through this pre-order/fundraiser will go directly to the cost of recording the album which includes the musicians, studio engineer, studio time and post-production. With IndieGoGo there are perks for every contribution, which means that individuals can contribute as little or as much as they'd like based on the items they would like to receive. It's important to note that ANY contribution will help bring us one step closer to our goal!

Last chance on Only Sons swag: If you contribute to a perk that comes with a Kent T-Shirt and/or Koozie you will also receive an Only Sons T-Shirt/Koozie. This is on a first come, first served basis due to supplies. The site will updated when they are gone. Contributing $45 and up? Missing an Only Sons album? Perks in the $45-$100 range will also come with a digital download of The Only Sons entire discography! That's 4 albums!

Thank you for your interest and support! We can't wait to share these songs with you.

You can check out non-album verisons of "Jesus Is My Landlord" & "Two By Two"- two fresh tracks that will appear on "Trophies Of Youth" at www.facebook.com/kentgoolsbymusic.

All t-shirts, koozies & posters are printed locally in Nashville, TN by Grand Palace Silkscreen.

 

www.kentgoolsbymusic.com

www.facebook.com/kentgoolsbymusic

story:
Contribute to the Blake St Salsa Block Party expense fund and to the Alzheimer’s Association. We hope to raise before and after the event some of the needed funds to cover expenses to supplement the contributions collected at the event. Although we’ve trimmed our budget (vs last year) to lower our overall goal, we will continue to donate 10% of the gross contributions to the Alzheimer’s Association. Any amount, if any, raised over our goal will be used at next year’s Block Party. We hope to finally reach our fundraising goal. 

Why do we give 10% of the gross contributions to the Alzheimer’s Association? Last year, the mother of the event producer, Agustin Luna, passed away from Alzheimer’s disease, after living with it for over ten years. She lived her life to the fullest as a wife, mother, daughter, sister, friend, senior citizen community leader, local church organizer, and dancer before the significant effects of the disease hit her.  She was quite a lady. The Alzheimer’s Association fights Alzheimer's disease through vital research and essential support programs and services. Please donate today to the Blake St Salsa Block Party expense fund!

The video above was taken at the 2012 Blake St Salsa Block Party for a documentary called The Last Mambo, which is a separate project by Rita Hargrave, a longtime supporter and attendee of the Salsa Block Party.  It shows a glimpse of what a past Salsa Block Party looks like and who attends. 

Some Information on the Alzheimer’s Association: The Alzheimer’s Association mission is to eliminate Alzheimer’s disease through the advancement of research; to provide and enhance care and support for all affected; and to reduce the risk of dementia through the promotion of brain health. Check out their website to learn more about them – www.alz.org.

Event Information

Agustín Luna Presents
8th Annual Blake Street Salsa Block Party 

Bay Area Salsa & Timba All Stars band (Musical Director: Patricio Angulo), plus DJ Walt Digz, DJ Jose Ruiz, and SambaFunk’s King Theo  
Monday, September 7, 2015 (Labor Day) 

Music 2pm-6pm (street closed 10am-7pm) 

Blake St between Ellsworth St and Fulton St, in front of 2231 Blake St in Berkeley, California


Bay Area Salsa & Timba All Stars Member List

Fito Reinoso - Lead Vocals & Coro

Edgardo Cambon - Lead Vocals, Coro & Congas

Christelle Durandy - Lead Vocals & Coro

Jose Luis - Coro 

Jordan Wilson - Coro

Sergio Duran - Timbal & Coro

Kim Agnew - Chekere

Jason Moen - Piano

Ernesto Mazar Kindelan - Bass

Bill Ortiz - Trumpet

Jeff Cressman - Trombone

Darren Smith - Tenor & Bari Saxes

Patricio Angulo - Drumset; Musical Director

story:
Musikvideo Produktion zur Single „The Ones In Power“

Nach der Veröffentlichung der ersten Single „Back Son“ ist das musikalische Projekt „hope will lead“ stetig gewachsen und 2017 nun groß geworden.
Es stehen der Singer-Songwriterin Carina Stockinger Künstler aus (fast) allen Sparten zur Seite. Neben MusikerInnen, Audioprofis, und TänzerInnen entsteht nun mit dem Jungregisseur Jura Branellec die visuelle Umsetzung des Projekts.
Nachdenkliche Texte & melancholisch-kraftvolle Melodien gehen Hand in Hand mit Tanz & entführen in eine eigene Welt die innerlich wie äußerlich tiefgreifend bewegt. Interdisziplinäre Zusammenarbeit ist somit ein Schlüsselelement von „hope will lead“.

 

Warum ist dieses Projekt so wichtig

„The Ones In Power“ trägt eine starke Message & die wollen wir mit eurer Hilfe transportieren! Und womit kann man heutzutage schon schneller & besser Aufmerksamkeit erregen als mit einem richtig guten Musikvideo? – Eben!

 

Worum geht es?

Unsere Welt ist geprägt von permanentem Medienkonsum & es ist richtig schwer noch zu unterscheiden was wahr/falsch, gut/böse, gesund/ungesund ist weil wir tagtäglich mit konträren Botschaften konfrontiert sind. Meist sind Medien darauf abgezielt uns in eine bestimmte Richtung zu lenken. Sie beeinflussen uns permanent, meist unterbewusst, in einer hektischen Welt, die kaum noch Zeit für kritisches Hinterfragen bietet & macht uns nach und nach zu Konsumsklaven, zu blinden Handlangern der Interessen großer Konzerne.
Dabei sind wir schöpferische Wesen, mit Meinung, Haltung, Bewusstsein. Wir sind individuell, vielfältig, einzigartig.
Dies wollen wir in unserem Musikvideo zu „The Ones In Power“ mittels symbolhaften Darstellungen unserer Gesellschaft umringt von „Steuerungsmechanismen“ zeigen.
Doch das innere Kind wird siegen, soviel sei verraten – repräsentiert durch die Tanzgruppe „Momentos Wien“ – werden die militärhaft gleichgeschaltenen Funktionsmenschen zum Leben erweckt & hinterfragen das ewige Spiel.


Das Drehbuch ist noch nicht komplett. Wir arbeiten laufend & intensiv an der Fertigstellung & Perfektionierung des Storyboards. Gut' Ding braucht eben Weile!

 

Wofür brauchen wir Geld & was können wir zurückgeben

Die Teilnahme aller technischen sowie künstlerischen Kräfte beruht auf Begeisterung für das Projekt, daher bemüht sich unsere Kampagne ausschließlich um Materialkostenersatz.
Außerdem benötigen wir Unterstützung für etwaige Drehortgebühr, Verpflegung, Kostüme, Anfahrtskosten, Parkscheine, Leihgebühr Kamera/Licht Equipment, Posterdruck etc.
Dafür werden laut unseren Hochrechnungen ca. 2.400€ benötigt.

Unsere Unterstützer und Unterstützerinnen erhalten für unterschiedliche Beiträge eine Vielzahl an Perks (=Vergünstigungen), angefangen von EPs mit persönlicher Widmung für 15€ bis hin zu einem akustischen Privatkonzert (innerhalb Österreichs) von "hope will lead" (natürlich inkl. Carina & 1 bis 2 Begleitinstrumenten) zum individuellen Wunschanlass um 1.000€. Dazwischen gibt es noch viele interessante Perks wie beispielsweise eine exklusive Gesangsstunde bei Carina oder Jura gibt dir eine Einführung in Kameratechnik, zwischen 90 und 120€.

Du hast keine oder wenig Finanzmittel, willst uns aber trotzdem oder zusätzlich zu Deinem Beitrag unterstützen?

Bitte teile unsere Kampagne mit Freunden, Bekannten oder Familienmitgliedern, die Interesse an unserem Projekt oder an den Perks haben könnten & motiviere sie mitzumachen!

 

 

Was können wir gemeinsam schaffen?

 

Aufmerksamkeit auf ein wichtiges Thema lenken, das jede und jeden in unserer heutigen Welt etwas angeht. Positive Veränderung erzielen. Ein Musikvideo kann vor allem deshalb vieles bewirken, weil es viele erreichen kann. Aber es geht nur mit Eurer Mithilfe & Eurer Energie.

Es ist unser erstes Crowdfunding-finanziertes Projekt, daher halten wir unser Aufwandsbudget noch etwas geringer. Jedoch wäre es schön, mit Euch, unseren Unterstützern gemeinsam zu wachsen um immer weitgreifendere zusammen zu bewerkstelligen.

 

 

Risiken & Herausforderungen

 

Ein Musikvideodreh bleibt eine organisatorische Herausforderung, vor allem wenn man inhaltlich so viel transportieren will, wie wir es vor haben. Die große Freude für uns ist es allerdings, so viel freiwillige Unterstützung durch unser Umfeld zu erfahren. Dies bestärkt & gibt uns Kraft auf dem Weg zu unserem gemeinsamen Ziel.
Doch nicht alles läuft von Anfang an komplett rund.. so haben wir beispielsweise leider noch keine Genehmigung für unseren Wunschdrehort & einige "Posten" am Set konnten wir noch nicht besetzen bzw. stockt die Vorproduktion durch das Noch-nicht-vorhanden-sein unseres Materialbudgets.
Jedoch sind wir mehr als zuversichtlich, dass wir es schaffen werden, eine kleine Bewegung vom Damm zu brechen & kollektiv etwas viel größeres zu erschaffen! hope will lead!

Meist sind Medien darauf abgezielt uns in eine bestimmte Richtung zu lenken. Sie beeinflussen uns permanent, meist unterbewusst, in einer hektischen Welt, die kaum noch Zeit für kritisches Hinterfragen bietet & macht uns nach und nach zu Konsumsklaven, zu blinden Handlangern der Interessen großer Konzerne.Dabei sind wir schöpferische Wesen, mit Meinung, Haltung, Bewusstsein. Wir sind individuell, vielfältig, einzigartig.Dies wollen wir in unserem Musikvideo zu „The Ones In Power“ mittels symbolhaften Darstellungen unserer Gesellschaft umringt von „Steuerungsmechanismen“ zeigen.Doch das innere Kind wird siegen, soviel sei verraten – repräsentiert durch die Tanzgruppe „Momentos Wien“ – werden die militärhaft gleichgeschaltenen Funktionsmenschen zum Leben erweckt & hinterfragen das ewige Spiel.
Das Drehbuch ist noch nicht komplett. Wir arbeiten laufend & intensiv an der Fertigstellung & Perfektionierung des Storyboards. Gut' Ding braucht eben Weile!
 
Wofür brauchen wir Geld & was können wir zurückgeben
Die Teilnahme aller technischen sowie künstlerischen Kräfte beruht auf Begeisterung für das Projekt, daher bemüht sich unsere Kampagne ausschließlich um Materialkostenersatz.Außerdem benötigen wir Unterstützung für etwaige Drehortgebühr, Verpflegung, Kostüme, Anfahrtskosten, Parkscheine, Leihgebühr Kamera/Licht Equipment, Posterdruck etc.Dafür werden laut unseren Hochrechnungen ca. 2.400€ benötigt.
Unsere Unterstützer und Unterstützerinnen erhalten für unterschiedliche Beiträge eine Vielzahl an Perks (=Vergünstigungen), angefangen von EPs mit persönlicher Widmung für 15€ bis hin zu einem akustischen Privatkonzert (innerhalb Österreichs) von "hope will lead" (natürlich inkl. Carina & 1 bis 2 Begleitinstrumenten) zum individuellen Wunschanlass um 1.000€. Dazwischen gibt es noch viele interessante Perks wie beispielsweise eine exklusive Gesangsstunde bei Carina oder Jura gibt dir eine Einführung in Kameratechnik, zwischen 90 und 120€.Du hast keine oder wenig Finanzmittel, willst uns aber trotzdem oder zusätzlich zu Deinem Beitrag unterstützen?
Bitte teile unsere Kampagne mit Freunden, Bekannten oder Familienmitgliedern, die Interesse an unserem Projekt oder an den Perks haben könnten & motiviere sie mitzumachen!
 
 Was können wir gemeinsam schaffen? Aufmerksamkeit auf ein wichtiges Thema lenken, das jede und jeden in unserer heutigen Welt etwas angeht. Positive Veränderung erzielen. Ein Musikvideo kann vor allem deshalb vieles bewirken, weil es viele erreichen kann. Aber es geht nur mit Eurer Mithilfe & Eurer Energie.Es ist unser erstes Crowdfunding-finanziertes Projekt, daher halten wir unser Aufwandsbudget noch etwas geringer. Jedoch wäre es schön, mit Euch, unseren Unterstützern gemeinsam zu wachsen um immer weitgreifendere zusammen zu bewerkstelligen.
  Risiken & Herausforderungen Ein Musikvideodreh bleibt eine organisatorische Herausforderung, vor allem wenn man inhaltlich so viel transportieren will, wie wir es vor haben. Die große Freude für uns ist es allerdings, so viel freiwillige Unterstützung durch unser Umfeld zu erfahren. Dies bestärkt & gibt uns Kraft auf dem Weg zu unserem gemeinsamen Ziel.Doch nicht alles läuft von Anfang an komplett rund.. so haben wir beispielsweise leider noch keine Genehmigung für unseren Wunschdrehort & einige "Posten" am Set konnten wir noch nicht besetzen bzw. stockt die Vorproduktion durch das Noch-nicht-vorhanden-sein unseres Materialbudgets.Jedoch sind wir mehr als zuversichtlich, dass wir es schaffen werden, eine kleine Bewegung vom Damm zu brechen & kollektiv etwas viel größeres zu erschaffen! hope will lead!

story:
Si te toparas con la oportunidad de hacer lo que más anhelas a diario, ¿darías el todo para conseguirlo? Nosotros sí. Pero sabemos que no podremos alcanzarlo solos. Es por ello que estamos pidiéndole la mano a un amigo como tú.


Baby Bhang: La Banda

Somos una banda puertorriqueña formada en el 2012, compuesta por Carla Rodríguez (voz, bajo), Rubén Arias (guitarra), y Alex Luciano Santos (percusión).

Tenemos la habilidad de integrar y proyectar en nuestro trabajo un sonido nuevo; producto de la combinación de nuestra gran variedad de influencias. Queremos compartir nuestras ideas contigo, y brindarte una nueva experiencia por medio de nuestra música.

¿En qué estarás ayudado?

Con tu aportación, podríamos llevar a cabo nuestro lanzamiento oficial como banda a nivel nacional. Esto incluye lanzar nuestro primer sencillo ''El Vuelo''. Estas donaciones también nos estarán dando una gran ayuda para lanzar nuestro primer video musical profesional y comenzar nuestro Media Tour.

No importa el tamaño de tu donación; con ésta lograrás que el talento boricua continúe creciendo.


Otras Ayudas

Si lo desea, hay otras maneras en las que puede contribuir a esta campaña:
1. Compartiendo esta página y nuestra historia en sus redes
2. Regale un “me gusta” a nuestra página (www.facebook.com/babybhangpr)
3. Siga nuestras cuentas en Instagram y YouTube
4. O comuníquese con nosotros por correo electrónico para más información y/o ayudas.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                                       (English)

If you came across the opportunity of doing what you love for a living, would you try your hardest to make it happen? We would. But we know that we can’t do it by ourselves. Because of that, we are in need a friend like you to give us a hand.

The Band

We are a Puerto Rican band formed in 2012, composed by Carla Rodriguez (vocals, bass), Ruben Arias (guitar) and Alex Luciano Santos (percussion). We have the ability to integrate and screen a brand new sound through our work; which results from the combination of our wide range of influences. That is why we want to share our ideas with you and bring you a new experience through our music.


How would you help?
With your contribution, we could carry out our official nationwide band launch; this will include the release of our first single ''El Vuelo''. The donations will also help us shoot our first professional music video and set off a Media Tour.
No matter the size of your donation; you will be helping Puerto Rican talent on its continuous growth.

There are other ways that you can contribute to this campaign:
1. Share this page and/or our history in your networks
2. Like our page (www.facebook.com/babybhangpr)
3. Follow our Instagram and YouTube accounts
Instagram: babybhangpr
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZaUNHAStb9fibn8u3-fyFA
4. Or contact us through email for more information

story:
Short Summary

10 months ago in a tiny London bedroom, 3 friends wrote their first song together called 'Feel The Weight' and decided then it was time to form a band. Since then we've gone on to headline iconic churches, perform in sold out venues and make waves across London as 'A band you simply have to hear' (17 Seconds) and 'Pure, perfect, sweet pop' (Clash Magazine).

Since September, we've spent over 100 hours writing and recording our debut release, a 3 track EP of 'refreshingly bold, playful and undoubtedly infectious' art-pop dealing with some of the lightest and darkest parts of life, death and growing. It's something we are hugely proud of and can't wait to share with you. 

We are also delighted to have been invited to take the EP on tour around the UK by performing at some of the best venues in cities including London, Liverpool, Manchester, Edinburgh and Cardiff this April.

We are unsigned, unmanaged and truly independent, so being given the opporunity to tour and release our record is crucial to our development. We hope that with your help we can take our band to the next stage of our career this summer!

What We Need & What You Get

All recording, mixing and mastering costs have been covered by the band through full time work, busking and saving but now we need your help to raise funds for the release and tour.

- We aim to raise £2000 for the EP release, this includes artwork, manufacturing, PR and distribution.

- We aim to raise £1500 for the UK tour, this includes van hire, merchandise, PR and accommodation.

In return, we've put together a bunch of (what we hope are) rather lovely perks for pledgers, from being the first to receive a limited edition copy of the EP and being on our guest list for a year, to having us throw you a house gig. We'll even bring cheese and pineapple on sticks.

The Impact

It would be very arrogant for us to say our music will have an impact on the world. But what we do know is continuing to make it and sharing it on record and with live audiences is something that brings us so much happiness and something which we would like to continue to do this summer.

We've never crowdfunded so we don't know what to expect! But what we do know is no matter how much we raise, we are eternally grateful for all of your support so far and can't wait to share what we've been working on with you!

Love
Mel, Kill & Izzy
PLAYING HOUSE

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with your friends using the Indiegogo share tools, Facebook, Twitter, pigeon, whatever you can. We only have 30 days to reach our goal and just over 40 til we head out on tour so every share is a huge help!

story:
Time to make it happen!

During a lunch  in 2013 Thomas and Jesper came up with a idea to start the world's smallest vinyl record festival "Gossen På Gatan", and they did. During the same lunch with the adrenaline kickin in a dream to release vinyl records on a own label came up. About an hour later the smalest record label in the world was born, Vinylgossen!

Almost 3 years later the guys at Vinylgossen will make there dream come thru. The band Northern UpBeat is signed, the songs is recorded and as soon Vinylgossen has the recorded master tape in their hands it will be sent to make a test press.



Please, help us to implement our dream with a Perk!

Sincerely
Jesper Sandberg & Thomas Andersson

After creating their third album the Sumni Boys want to fulfill their dream by performing at the natural temple of Weolmyeongdong in South Korea. Please help them raise the funds for their plane tickets by contributing to our crowdsourcing campaign!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I am Dianna Nicole. I'm a married mother of 5. Homeschooler, teacher, children's church director and so much more! I have been afraid to sing out for so long. But now I have seen how my music touches others  and I am ready to share it with the world. I hope to help encourage someone, lift them up, or change a life. 
I also want to go take my music into places  where people would not normally be able to afford it, or have the freedom to get to it. Like the homeless, incarcerated, sick and disabled.  I want to take my music to the people who need it most. 
Donors will help me complete my EP recording project, with copywrights, distribution and all.
What We Need 
-studio sessions
-musicians
-recording equipment
-copywrights
-press kit
-travel


Other Ways You Can Help

 I know that everyone will not be able to be here, but you can also help by sharing this information with someone who can!

story:
Meet The Composer:

Jessica DiMari is an enthusiastic, internationally recognized composer based out of New York. She received a B. Mus. in Music Composition from The Conservatory of Music at Brooklyn College with Magna Cum Laude honors.  She is currently pursuing her Masters in Media Scoring at the Feirstein Graduate School of Cinema. 

Featured in the 2018 ASCAP/Columbia University Film Scoring Spotlight, Jessica has scored soundtracks for various media. Films she’s scored have screened at the Urban Action Film Festival in Times Square, The Directors Guild of America Theater, the YoFi Fest, SENE Film, Music and Arts Festival, CUNY film festival at BAM Rose Cinemas and festivals in the United Kingdom. Her score for the short film Klaus landed her a National Board of Review Award nomination.

In addition to scoring film soundtracks, Jessica also composes for the concert hall. Her orchestral music has been hailed by [Q] On Stage: New York Performances and Arts Reviews as “uplifting, conveying hope, spirit, and growing confidence, and making use of the orchestra’s full sonority”. Her work has been performed by The Ethel String Quartet, The Goodbye Saturn Quartet, Vent Noveau in partnership with Listening To Ladies, commissioned by the (New York Times Critic’s Pick) Eco-Music Big Band, Sing For Hope and The Queer Urban Orchestra.

Her concert music has premiered in Tokyo, Japan, St. Petersburg, Florida, at Roulette Intermedium, ShapeShifter Lab, Gallery MC, Baruch College, The Brooklyn Museum, The Queens Museum, Poindexter Hall at Mississippi University, three International Electroacoustic Music Festivals, and received radio airplay in Cuba.

Jessica is a Made in New York Scholarship recipient, as well as a proud member of Women in Music, the SCL, ASCAP, and the Audio Engineering Society. 

 

What I Need:

I am working to raise $5,000 to accommodate the Ensemble in the recording of my 'Wallace and Gromit' re-score, as well as raise funds to book a venue and catering for the screening night. 

I have the incredible opportunity to combine two of my favorite things; film scoring and working with live players to create 25+ minutes of music, of which the recording sessions will be divided among a series of days, focusing on specific instrumental groups: string quartet, woodwinds, brass, and piano. 

I welcome you to share this campaign with everyone to contribute to the journey of bringing my music to the screen.  Spread the word so my music can be heard!


PERK: Anyone who donates $25.00 or more, will receive a shout out in the program at the screening night!


(Please note my thesis project re-score is for educational purposes - the completion of my Masters degree. I do not own any visual material in regards to the film, and the screening event is free).

story:
Overview

We are Staring in Spaces, an indie pop duo from Lake Geneva, Wisconsin. We released our debut album, "Stop Talking," in November 2018. The album performed much better than we had initially anticipated, racking up over 400,000 streams across streaming platforms. Inspired by the success of the first album, we hopped back in the studio to begin work on the second. With a little support, you can help make this album bigger and better than the first and get us closer to achieving our musical dreams! 

What We Need & What You Get

This time around, we wanted to do things right. We've hired a graphic designer (for album art, merch, etc.) and a professional audio engineer to master the album. We'd also like to perform an album release concert in our home town. To do this, we need to rent a performance space. We're asking for $850 to help cover these costs.

Check out our fun perks to see what you can get for donating!

story:
What’s in it for you?
If you want to know why you should support my campaign, this paragraph is all you need, there’s no need to read all the rest.
You can own an actual CD of this album, Get your very own hand written lyrics, and maybe have me or the band over for a special kind of concert at your own house!
You’re a musician and in need of a song production? Make your dream come true and release your very own song under my production!
Or maybe enjoy an awesome Berlin tour when coming for a visit, seriously, we have tons of perks and items for you!
And last, but defiantly not the least. You’ll be a patron of art and creativity, your support will be the fuel behind a brand new album, 12 songs, hundreds of words and infinite melodies.
You’re in? Cool, just pick a perk and you’re golden!
Not sure yet? keep on reading.

About Me
 My name is Moran Magal and I am here to invite you to support the crowdfunding campaign
for my new album - 'Under Your Bed' :

I am a singer-song writer, pianist and composer,  and I’ve been making music my entire life. 
I am originally from Israel where I started my career, performed on numerous stages, and even participated at “the voice” – The Israeli edition:


A while ago I released my last album 'Shades of Metal' and collaborated with incredible musicians like Warrel Dane (Nevermore). and 'Orphaned Land'.
Three years ago I decided to leave everything behind and move to Berlin so I can introduce my music to more audiences.  It was not easy to leave it all behind, my family, my friends, my job, and to take this huge leap of faith to the unknown and follow my heart and my dreams, but it turned out to be a great step. And since then I have started my own band and we are playing across Europe on Festival stages and different Venues. 

A little about my upcoming album
 'Under Your Bed' can be described as a Piano based Folk-Rock album with some Gothic Metal influences.
It’s a very melodic, romantic, dark and powerful Album. I wrote and composed all the songs in this album by myself, and recorded most of it in our home studio, in our tiny apartment in Berlin.

Why do I need your support?
It took me years to write and compose this album that I am so proud of as an artist, and the finish line is almost here.
But now comes the most expensive part, dealing with final production, mixing, mastering and printing it.
And because I want the best quality for this album, so my audience could have it in the best way possible, the price tag is high and I need 7000 Euros to be able to release this album and present my new music to this world.
I am doing the best I can to fund this album, I work in a music school, I teach piano and vocal lessons and try to perform as much as I can, but there is no way I can do it without your support.


How can you support my cause?
Well, you can buy the new album or the previous ones I released. 
Book Skype lessons with me, purchase handwritten lyrics from the new album, Book a home concert, let me guide in a Berlin tour and so much more!
There are much more perks inside, just pick one of the awesome perks I created for you.
Your support means a lot to me, that’s the only way I can release this album! 

Oh, and one last thing! every perk you purchase includes a digital copy of my album, because sharing my music with you means the world to me.
story_txt: What’s in it for you?If you want to know why you should support my campaign, this paragraph is all you need, there’s no need to read all the rest.You can own an actual CD of this album, Get your very own hand written lyrics, and maybe have me or the band over for a special kind of concert at your own house!You’re a musician and in need of a song production? Make your dream come true and release your very own song under my production!Or maybe enjoy an awesome Berlin tour when coming for a visit, seriously, we have tons of perks and items for you!And last, but defiantly not the least. You’ll be a patron of art and creativity, your support will be the fuel behind a brand new album, 12 songs, hundreds of words and infinite melodies.You’re in? Cool, just pick a perk and you’re golden!Not sure yet? keep on reading.About Me My name is Moran Magal and I am here to invite you to support the crowdfunding campaignfor my new album - 'Under Your Bed' :I am a singer-song writer, pianist and composer,  and I’ve been making music my entire life. I am originally from Israel where I started my career, performed on numerous stages, and even participated at “the voice” – The Israeli edition:A while ago I released my last album 'Shades of Metal' and collaborated with incredible musicians like Warrel Dane (Nevermore). and 'Orphaned Land'.Three years ago I decided to leave everything behind and move to Berlin so I can introduce my music to more audiences.  It was not easy to leave it all behind, my family, my friends, my job, and to take this huge leap of faith to the unknown and follow my heart and my dreams, but it turned out to be a great step. And since then I have started my own band and we are playing across Europe on Festival stages and different Venues. A little about my upcoming album 'Under Your Bed' can be described as a Piano based Folk-Rock album with some Gothic Metal influences.It’s a very melodic, romantic, dark and powerful Album. I wrote and composed all the songs in this album by myself, and recorded most of it in our home studio, in our tiny apartment in Berlin.Why do I need your support?It took me years to write and compose this album that I am so proud of as an artist, and the finish line is almost here.But now comes the most expensive part, dealing with final production, mixing, mastering and printing it.And because I want the best quality for this album, so my audience could have it in the best way possible, the price tag is high and I need 7000 Euros to be able to release this album and present my new music to this world.I am doing the best I can to fund this album, I work in a music school, I teach piano and vocal lessons and try to perform as much as I can, but there is no way I can do it without your support.How can you support my cause?Well, you can buy the new album or the previous ones I released. Book Skype lessons with me, purchase handwritten lyrics from the new album, Book a home concert, let me guide in a Berlin tour and so much more!There are much more perks inside, just pick one of the awesome perks I created for you.Your support means a lot to me, that’s the only way I can release this album! Oh, and one last thing! every perk you purchase includes a digital copy of my album, because sharing my music with you means the world to me.

story:
~ In 200 Characters ~

I'm Tragoe & I'm raising funds to film 4 new music stories, all prequels to the narrative of Souls. As a reward for your support, you can claim your Founding Member status and many other fun rewards!

 

~ The Stories ~

You know the narrative of 'Souls', right?

Mr. T wakes up one morning, and he sees a strange vision: he sees someone else in the mirror...

The visions get weirder. He gets visited by an otherworldly creature that seems to come from... the forest? Strange things.

But the weirdest thing has yet to come: through a portal, he gets invited into the forest. Without reluctance, he follows.

Speechless, he witnesses an ancient ceremony. He's their honoured guest.

He's sacrificed, but he's not dead. Quite the contrary. He's turned into an enlightened shaman.

Meet Tragoe.

Watch the whole story here:

 

~ The Nagging Questions ~

Yet the story raised more questions... 

  • Why has this happened?
  • What does it all mean?
  • Who was Tragoe before he was Tragoe?
  • And why did he follow the otherworldly Nymphs without resistance?

The 4 prequels to 'Souls' will answer these questions - and maybe they'll raise new, more interesting ones.

 

~ Your Support ~

Your support will be invaluable.

Filming such stories is expensive. They require a full team (filmmaker, editor, colour grader, light technician, makeup artist, hair & headpiece artist, actors, extras, assistants, handymen, etc.) and it’s impossible to finance them without your help.

With your support, we can turn these music stories into a reality - together.

As a reward for your support, you can claim your Founding Member status - available only for a few special people - and many other fun rewards!

Will you help me?

 

~ The Founding Member status ~

The Tragoe tribe is a safe home where you are appreciated for who you are.

A haven to connect with people on the same path like you. A playground to make new friends. A place to learn, grow, and express your skills & feelings.

This tribe is YOU.

The Founding Member status is an intangible token of appreciation for those who care deeply and actively help the tribe grow, improve, and evolve. Only a few (handpicked) special people have been invited to claim & honour this status.

 

~ The Rewards ~

Except for the 'Founding Member' status, you can claim many unique rewards, such as:

  • A limited-edition tree USB album (only 100 copies, numbered, never to be available again), preloaded with music, videos, lyrics, booklets, & a surprise video JUST for you!
  • A thank-you mention in the credits of all next 4 music videos & behind-the-scene footage/bloopers!
  • We'll brainstorm together on a 1:1 call & you might add your own touch in the narrative!
  • A little parcel handled with care by yours truly, including a limited-edition t-shirt, signed lyric sheets, a signed postcard, and... a surprise gift just for you!
  • I'll perform a 5-song acoustic set just for you via Zoom. Then we'll hang out & have fun over coffee, tea, or wine. I'll even record our call, so you can rewatch it!
  • I'll personally create for you a clay figurine of your choice. It can be me, you, or anyone/anything you like! I will mould it with love & will dry it out in the Greek Sun!
  • You'll name one of the 2 Nymphs after YOU or a person you love!
  • You'll be able to pick ANY prop of your desire and make it yours to keep, once all music stories have been filmed & released. You can't steal humans, sorry :P
  • I'll write a song about your personal story and will feature it in my next album.

Pretty special rewards, for pretty special people, from me to you with love.

 

~ The Timeline ~

My country, Greece, is on a short lockdown right now. We expect to start filming in December (if the lockdown is lifted as scheduled) or in January (if the lockdown is extended). The first music story is expected to be published in February, and the others will follow shortly thereafter.

The limited-edition tree USB album will be shipped once all of the music stories have been filmed and edited, so that their HD versions, behind-the-scenes and bloopers can be included in it, for your exclusive pleasure.

For any reward that you've claimed, we can talk personally on Instagram, Facebook, or via email, so we can arrange its fulfilment and customisation.

Thanks again for helping me make these music stories a reality.

Positive energy and love,
// Tragoe

story:
Who Are We?

What started off as friends meeting in a basement over food and God's word, has now become what they are today - MiddleChild Records. 

MiddleChild Records is an urban music label created by three middle children; Philip Ofori Darko, Anthony Sawyers and Daniel Bailey who use their gifts and talents to make world-class music and art that glorifies God.

Our mission comes from biblical scriptures such as: 

"We were once sinful, disobedient children who would only seek for our own gratification and pleasure, but have been given mercy and are now sons of God." - Eph 2:2-5

"We were ransomed and adapted to God the Father through our Lord Jesus Christ." - Rom 8:15

"See what kind of love the father has given to us, that we should be called children of God, and so we are" - 1 John 3:1 
 

What Do We Need?

We are asking for $1500.00

We desire to grow MiddleChild Records into a self-sufficient music label. With your help and by supporting our EP "Behind Closed Doors" it would be the first step to reaching that goal. 

Your support will go to: 

  • Covering the expenses of "Behind Closed Doors" 
  • Purchasing custom Merchandise 
  • Investing into MCR for future projects 

To thank you, we have a large variety of perks that we believe will bless you just as much as you bless us!

Why Do We Do This?

We do not make music as merely a hobby. We believe and know that our gifts are first for the glory of God and encouragement for the people of God. Music is one of the platforms we use to tell the world about God. With your help and support, our vision can be carried out to greater lengths than we can do on our own.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot support us financially, you have nothing to fear, If it was about the money, we wouldn't be making music in the first place. 

We do however ask, that you spread the word! 

We will be releasing a lot of content very shortly and we need your help to share our content. 

We thank you in advance for all your love, support, and prayers! 

Please follow us on our social media accounts to keep updated on what we are doing next: 

  • Twitter: @Themcrecords
  • Facebook: MiddleChild Records 
  • Instagram: @ThemiddlechildRecords
  • Youtube: MiddleChild Records

story:
(English follows)

Résumé

Je joue de la guitare sur des instruments historiques et mon objectif est de faire revivre la frénésie et l’émerveillement que suscitait la guitare à l’époque romantique. Mes deux premiers albums ont reçu un superbe accueil de la critique. Vous pouvez les entendre sur mon  site web http://www.pascalvalois.com

La campagne que je lance a pour objectif d'amasser 2500$ pour compléter le financement de mon troisième album «Napoli 1810». Cet album sera composé d' œuvres romantiques italiennes de Niccolò Paganini (1782-1840), de Mauro Giuliani (1781-1829) et de Ferdinando Carulli (1770-1841), dont la «Sonate op. 59, no. 1» sera enregistrée en première mondiale. Cet album sera mon premier à paraître sur le prestigieux label canadien Analekta.

Pourquoi contribuer?

Le financement que j'obtiendrai par cette campagne servira à payer la production et la postproduction de l'album : la réalisation, le travail des techniciens sonores, le montage, le mixage et le matriçage. Chaque étape de la réalisation d'un album engendre des coûts élevés. Si je n’atteins pas l'objectif de 2500$, j'irai quand même de l'avant avec le projet et les montants reçus serviront pour les mêmes postes budgétaires.

  • Si vous donnez 20$ à la campagne, je vous enverrai une copie physique de l'album  «Napoli 1810» en février 2021.
  • Pour 30$,  je vous enverrai des copies des albums «Napoli 1810» et «Napoleonian Guitar Sonatas».
  • Si vous pouvez donner 40$,  je vous enverrai des copies des albums «Napoli 1810», «Napoleonian Guitar Sonatas» et «Works of Victor Magnien».
  • Pour 450$ et +, je donne un concert complet pour votre famille et vos amis chez vous!

Comment m'aider!

Si vous ne pouvez pas contribuer financièrement à la campagne, un simple partage sur les réseaux sociaux serait un geste très précieux et fortement apprécié! Merci de tout cœur à l'avance!

Summary

I have been playing historical guitars for the last 20 years and I am dedicated to reviving enthusiasm for the guitar scene during the Romantic era. My first two albums received wonderful reviews: you can hear them on my website http://www.pascalvalois.com

The goal of this campaign is to raise 2500$ to complete the financing of my third album: "Napoli 1810". This album will feature Italian romantic music by Niccolò Paganini (1782-1840), Mauro Giuliani (1781-1829) and Ferdinando Carulli (1770-1841). It will be the  world premiere recording of Carulli's "Sonata op. 59, no. 1".

Why contribute?

The money I will raise will be used for the production and the post-production of the album: producers, technicians, mixing, editing and mastering. Every step of the recording process involves steep costs. If i do not reach the 2500$ goal, the project will still move forward and the money I raised will help to pay for the same expenses.

  • If you give 20$, I will send a physical copy of the album "Napoli 1810" in February 2021.
  • For 30$,  I will send copies of the albums "Napoli 1810" and "Napoleonian Guitar Sonatas".
  • If you are able to give 40$, I will send copies of the albums "Napoli 1810", "Napoleonian Guitar Sonatas" and "Works of Victor Magnien".
  • For 450$ or more, I will give a full recital at your place. You can invite your family and friends!

How to help!

If you cannot afford to contribute to the campaign, a simple share on  social media would help tremendously! Thank you so much to everyone in advance!

story:
MY Story

In 2003, after many years of writing, playing and producing for several artists, I decided to make the investment and produce myself! I always dreamed of becoming a contemporary jazz artist, so I spent hours, days, months and years in the studio, creating  my 2005 release, "Timeless". Upon the release of this project, I worked hard to get local performances, bars, small clubs, picnics, community fairs and the like, in order to introduce it, and begin building my niche in the jazz market.

In 2006, after seeing the success of "Timeless", I went in the studio and began recording my 2008 release,  "The Shedd".  Working full time as a high school counselor, raising 2 children plus one on the way, and owning/operating a beautiful brand new recording studio, I barely had time to breathe.  I spent every waking hour working to cover the expense of what would be the album that officially launched my jazz career.
"The Shedd" featured Steve Cole, Gerald Veasley, Carol Riddick, one of my bass hero's, Alex Al, Donald Robinson and a host of other amazing and notable jazz greats.  

Immediately upon it's release,"The Shedd" grabbed the attention of radio DJ's,  online magazines, interviewers, club owners, etc..  Almost instantly my band went from playing community picnics, to being in the top clubs in and around Philadelphia.  In fact, we began to play so frequently, that there was not enough time to record the next project for 3 years.

In 2011, I finally had the opportunity to record my 2013 release,  "Epiphany"!  To date, I have been so amazed at the response and support of this album.  "Epiphany" featured artists such as Gerald Albright, Gerald Veasley, Carol Riddick, Jamie Knight, Frank McComb, Elan Trotman and many more!  A far cry from 2005, "Epiphany" opened doors for me to begin traveling the country and the world, performing in places that I've only dreamed of!  One amazing opportunity came in September of 2013, The Capital Jazz Cruise, where I was a featured artist along side, Alex Bugnon, Gerald Veasley, Jeff Lorber, Paul Taylor, Najee, Jeanette Harris, Joey Sommerville, Jeff Bradshaw, Chrissette Michelle, Stephanie Mills, Larry Graham, Anthony Hamilton and many more.  As a result, I was also featured with Alex Bugnon in NYC at the Irridium, along side Elan Trotman.  Another highlight stemming from this release, would be my very recent European tour, in which I headlined for 3 weeks through Europe with my band, meeting wonderful people and performing in the most amazing of venues!

Inspired by my musical journey so far, I am now ready to release "Mr. Guitar"!  In between travels, I spent time writing and producing one of my most personal projects to date!  This new album features some of the new, young, invigorating jazz and soul artists on the scene right now.  Elan Trotman, Jeanette Harris, Gail Jhonson, Andrew Neu, Jamie Knight and Jaguar Wright, make up my fresh and youthful 4th album.  If each album has allowed me to see more of the world, and more of my dreams come true, I can only imagine the outcome of "Mr. Guitar"! 

Campaign:
I have always funded my own albums and releases.  I've taken on 2 jobs, borrowed money, performed to make enough to cover the process, etc.  I've been able to create great projects through hard work, but I have not been able to advertise, market or promote any of them.  This time I funded my project as usual, but I am asking for your support to package the project (IE, mastering, pictures, CD duplication/manufacturing), and to advertise/market the project, (IE, radio, publicity, publications, etc).

Packaging my project is estimated at $2,000.00  After packaging, the advertising and marketing could cost anywhere from $2,000 -$3,000 per month for 3 months, depending on the team I go with, in order to do this job.  Usually a record label would cover these items.  I however, have made the decision to stay independent, because I want to have the power to release whatever music is in my head and heart, without being controlled by a third party.  

Your help in this endeavor will be priceless!  I want to come perform in your cities, but I am constantly being met with the word "No" from festival owners, clubs, booking agents and promoters, because I am not known enough to be on their bill.  After much research, I finally discovered the channels to go through, in order to eradicate this problem!  I can't do it without your help.  Thank you so much for your time.  Please feel free to email me at bookdpsnow@gmail.com, for any questions or concerns!  

If you are unable to contribute financially, please still send this message around.  Any help you can give to get the word out to people, would be of great help to me.  

Thank you!!


Sincerely,
David P Stevens (Mr. Guitar)
